snippet: The American businessman Randy Lerner put the Premier League team Aston Villa up for sale after eight years in control, saying he was drained by the “week-in, week-out battles.”
abstract: American businessman Randy Lerner puts the Premier League team Aston Villa up for sale after eight years in control, saying he is drained.
lead_paragraph: The American businessman Randy Lerner put the Premier League team Aston Villa up for sale after eight years in control, saying he was drained by the “week-in, week-out battles.”
